metadata.title: CVE-2016-7398 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A type confusion vulnerability in the merge_param() function of php_http_params.c in PHP's pecl-http extension 3.1.0beta2 (PHP 7) and earlier as well as 2.6.0beta2 (PHP 5) and earlier allows attackers to crash PHP and possibly execute arbitrary code via crafted HTTP requests.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-7398` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-http - 3.1.0+2.6.0-4build8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-pecl-http package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.0+2.6.0-4build8').
